instructions:
Combine sugar, margarine and evaporated milk in heavy 2 1/2 quart saucepan. Bring to full rolling boil,
stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Remove from heat. Add chocolate chips and stir until melted. Add
remaining ingredients; beat until well blended. Pour into well greased 9 x 13 inch baking pan. Cool at room
temperature. Cut into squares.
name: Turtle Fudge
